title: Fix incorrect country flag question answers

requirements.summary: Audit and correct all country flag questions in frontend/src/data/questions.ts to ensure correctAnswer indices match the actual correct country names in the options arrays
acceptanceCriteria: Every flag question's correctAnswer field matches the index of the option that correctly identifies the country shown in the flag image
All 50+ flag questions have been reviewed and corrected where mismatches exist

file_operations.description: Review all entries in the flagQuestions array and verify that each question's correctAnswer index (0-3) points to the correct country name option that matches the flag image URL. For each flag question, cross-reference the image property (e.g., 'frontend/public/assets/generated/flag-iran.dim_200x133.png') with the options array to identify which index contains the correct country name (e.g., 'ایران'). Update the correctAnswer field for any questions where the index is incorrect. Maintain all existing Persian text, options order, and image URLs without modification.
